name: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager 14
summary: Content pack for SEPM 14.3 RU1 MP1
description: This content pack contains a Stream,Pipeline, Pipeline rules, and Grok patterns for SEPM 14.3 RU1 MP1.

source.@value:
pipeline "Symantec Endpoint Protection"
stage 0 match either
rule "Symantec Client Logs"
rule "Symantec Traffic Logs"
rule "Symantec Server Logs"
rule "Symantec Device Manager Logs"
rule "Symantec Application Control Logs 1"
rule "Symantec Application Control Logs 2"
rule "SEPM Authentication Events"
rule "Symantec IPS Logs"
rule "Symantec Scan Results"
end

rule "Symantec Virus Detection"
when
    to_bool(regex("Virus found",to_string($message.message)).matches)
then
    set_fields(
        grok(
            "f-sepm SymantecServer: Virus found,IP Address: %{IP:src_addr},Computer name: %{GREEDYDATA:src_hostname},Source: %{GREEDYDATA:method},Risk name: %{GREEDYDATA:risk_name},Occurrences: %{INT:repeat_count},File path: (%{GREEDYDATA:file_path})?,Description: %{GREEDYDATA:event_description},Actual action: %{GREEDYDATA:action_type},Requested action: %{GREEDYDATA:requested_action},Secondary action: %{GREEDYDATA:secondary_action},Event time: %{GREEDYDATA:start_time},Event Insert Time: %{GREEDYDATA:event_insert_time},End Time: %{GREEDYDATA:end_time},Last update time: %{GREEDYDATA:last_update_time},Domain Name: %{GREEDYDATA:domain_origin},Group Name: %{GREEDYDATA:symantec_ou},Server Name: %{HOSTNAME:sepm_server},User Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:user_origin})?,Source Computer Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:source_computer_hostname})?,Source Computer IP: (%{GREEDYDATA:source_computer_ip})?,Disposition: (%{GREEDYDATA:dispositon})?,Download site: (%{GREEDYDATA:download_site})?,Web domain: (%{GREEDYDATA:web_domain})?,Downloaded by: (%{GREEDYDATA:downloaded_by})?,Prevalence: (%{GREEDYDATA:prevalence})?,Confidence: (%{GREEDYDATA:confidence})?,URL Tracking Status: (%{GREEDYDATA:url_tracking_status})?,First Seen: (%{GREEDYDATA:first_seen})?,Sensitivity: (%{GREEDYDATA:sensitivity})?,Allowed application reason: (%{GREEDYDATA:permitted_reason})?,Application hash: (%{SHA256hash:sha256_hash})?,Hash type: (%{GREEDYDATA:hash_type})?,Company name: (%{GREEDYDATA:company_name})?,Application name: (%{GREEDYDATA:application_name})?,Application version: (%{GREEDYDATA:application_version})?,Application type: (%{GREEDYDATA:application_type})?,File size \\(bytes\\): %{INT:file_size},Category set: %{GREEDYDATA:category_set},Category type: %{GREEDYDATA:category_type},Location: %{GREEDYDATA:symantec_org},Intensive Protection Level: %{INT:protection_level},Certificate issuer: (%{GREEDYDATA:cert_issuer})?,Certificate signer: (%{GREEDYDATA:cert_signer})?,Certificate thumbprint: (%{GREEDYDATA:cert_thumbprint})?,Signing timestamp: (%{GREEDYDATA:signing_timestamp})?,Certificate serial( number:%{GREEDYDATA:cert_serial_number})?",
           to_string($message.message),
           true
        )
    );
end

rule "Symantec Server Logs"
when
    to_bool(regex("Site:",to_string($message.message)).matches)
then
    set_fields(
        grok(
            "SymantecServer: (%{GREEDYDATA:symantec_server})?Site: %{GREEDYDATA:symantec_site},Server Name: %{HOSTNAME:local_hostname},(\")?Event Description: %{GREEDYDATA:event_description}",to_string($message.message),true        )
    );
end

rule "Symantec Application Control Logs 3"
when
    to_bool(regex("Device ID:",to_string($message.message)).matches)
then
    set_fields(
        grok(
            "%{HOSTNAME:symantec_server} SymantecServer: %{HOSTNAME:local_hostname},(%{IP:local_addr}||%{DATA:UNWANTED})?,%{WORD:action},%{GREEDYDATA:api_name},Begin: %{GREEDYDATA:start_time},End Time: %{GREEDYDATA:end_time},Rule:(%{GREEDYDATA:rule_name})?,%{INT:ProcessID},%{GREEDYDATA:ParentProcess},%{INT:UNWANTED},(%{GREEDYDATA:module_name})?,%{GREEDYDATA:Process},User Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:user_origin})?,Domain Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:domain_origin})?,Action Type: (%{GREEDYDATA:action_type})?,File size \\(bytes\\): (%{INT:file_size})?,Device ID:( %{GREEDYDATA:device_id})?",
           to_string($message.message),
           true
        )
    );
end

rule "Symantec Application Control Logs 1"
when
    to_bool(regex("Device ID:",to_string($message.message)).matches)
then
    set_fields(
        grok(
            "%{HOSTNAME:symantec_server} SymantecServer: %{HOSTNAME:local_hostname},(%{IP:local_addr}||%{DATA:UNWANTED})?,%{WORD:action}, (- Caller SHA256=%{SHA256hash:SHA256_hash} - Target Arguments=)?%{GREEDYDATA:arguments},%{GREEDYDATA:api_name},Begin:%{GREEDYDATA:start_time},End Time:%{GREEDYDATA:end_time},Rule:(%{GREEDYDATA:rule_name})?,%{INT:ProcessID},%{GREEDYDATA:ParentProcess},%{INT:UNWANTED},(%{GREEDYDATA:module_name})?,%{GREEDYDATA:Process},User Name:(%{GREEDYDATA:user_origin})?,Domain Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:domain_origin})?,Action Type: (%{GREEDYDATA:action_type})?,File size \\(bytes\\): (%{INT:file_size})?,Device ID:( %{GREEDYDATA:device_id})?",
           to_string($message.message),
           true
        )
    );
end

rule "Symantec IPS Logs 1"
when
    to_bool(regex("CIDS Signature ID",to_string($message.message)).matches)
then
    set_fields(
        grok(
            "%{HOSTNAME:symantec_server} SymantecServer: %{HOSTNAME:local_hostname},Event Description: %{GREEDYDATA:event_description}. Application path: (%{GREEDYDATA:application_path})?,Event Type:(%{GREEDYDATA:event_type})?,Local Host IP: %{IP:local_addr},Local Host MAC: %{GREEDYDATA:dest_mac},Remote Host Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:remote_hostname})?,Remote Host IP: (%{IP:remote_ip})?,Remote Host MAC: (%{GREEDYDATA:remote_mac})?,(%{WORD:direction})?,(%{WORD:protocol})?,(%{WORD:action})?,Begin: %{GREEDYDATA:start_time},End Time: %{GREEDYDATA:end_time},Occurrences: %{INT:repeat_count},Application: (%{GREEDYDATA:application})?,Location: %{GREEDYDATA:symantec_org},User Name: %{GREEDYDATA:user_origin},Domain Name: %{GREEDYDATA:domain_origin},Local Port: %{INT:local_port},Remote Port: %{INT:remote_port},CIDS Signature ID: %{GREEDYDATA:sig_id1},CIDS Signature string: (%{GREEDYDATA:sig_name})?,CIDS Signature SubID: %{GREEDYDATA:sig_id2},Intrusion URL: (%{GREEDYDATA:intrusion_url})?,Intrusion Payload URL: (%{GREEDYDATA:payload_url})?,SHA-256: (%{GREEDYDATA:sha256_hash})?,MD-5:(%{GREEDYDATA:md5_hash})?,Intensive Protection Level: (%{GREEDYDATA:intensive_protection_level})?,URL Risk: (%{GREEDYDATA:url_risk})?,URL Category: (%{GREEDYDATA:url_category})?",
           to_string($message.message),
           true
        )
    );
end

description.@value: Traffic blocked to to attempted attack

source.@value:
rule "Symantec Traffic Blocked"
when
    to_bool(regex("Event Description: The client will block traffic",to_string($message.message)).matches)
then
    set_fields(
        grok(
            "SymantecServer: %{GREEDYDATA:local_hostname},Event Description: %{GREEDYDATA:event_description}.,Local Host IP: %{IP:local_addr},Local Host MAC: %{SymantecMAC:local_mac},Remote Host Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:remote_hostname})?,Remote Host IP: %{IP:remote_addr},Remote Host MAC: %{SymantecMAC:remote_mac},%{WORD:direction},%{WORD:others},,Begin: %{GREEDYDATA:start_time},End Time: %{GREEDYDATA:end_time},Occurrences: %{INT:repeat_count},Application: (%{GREEDYDATA:application})?,Location: %{GREEDYDATA:event_location},User Name: %{GREEDYDATA:user_origin},Domain Name: %{GREEDYDATA:domain_origin},Local Port: %{INT:local_port},Remote Port: %{INT:remote_port},CIDS Signature ID: %{GREEDYDATA:sig_id1},CIDS Signature string: (%{GREEDYDATA:sig_name})?,CIDS Signature SubID: %{GREEDYDATA:sig_id2},Intrusion URL: (%{GREEDYDATA:intrusion_url})?,Intrusion Payload URL: (%{GREEDYDATA:payload_url})?,SHA-256: (%{SHA256hash:sha256_hash})?,MD-5:( %{MD5hash:md5_hash})?",
           to_string($message.message),
           true
        )
    );
end

description.@value: ISP Logs 2 block traffic for application

source.@value:
rule "Symantec IPS Logs 2"
when
    to_bool(regex("Intrusion ID",to_string($message.message)).matches)
then
    set_fields(
        grok(
            "%{HOSTNAME:symantec_server} SymantecServer: %{HOSTNAME:local_hostname},Event Description: %{GREEDYDATA:event_description}. Traffic has been blocked for this application: (%{GREEDYDATA:application_path})?,Local Host IP: %{IP:local_addr},Local Host MAC: %{SymantecMAC:dest_mac},Remote Host Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:remote_hostname})?,Remote Host IP: (%{IP:remote_ip})?,Remote Host MAC: (%{SymantecMAC:remote_mac})?,(%{WORD:direction})?,(%{WORD:protocol})?,Intrusion ID: (%{GREEDYDATA:intrustion_id})?,Begin: %{GREEDYDATA:start_time},End Time: %{GREEDYDATA:end_time},Occurrences: %{INT:repeat_count},Application: (%{GREEDYDATA:application})?,Location: %{GREEDYDATA:symantec_org},User Name: %{GREEDYDATA:user_origin},Domain Name: %{GREEDYDATA:domain_origin},Local Port: %{INT:local_port},Remote Port: %{INT:remote_port},CIDS Signature ID: %{GREEDYDATA:sig_id1},CIDS Signature string: (%{GREEDYDATA:sig_name})?,CIDS Signature SubID: %{GREEDYDATA:sig_id2},Intrusion URL: (%{GREEDYDATA:intrusion_url})?,Intrusion Payload URL: (%{GREEDYDATA:payload_url})?,SHA-256: (%{SHA256hash:sha256_hash})?,MD-5:(%{MD5hash:md5_hash})?",
           to_string($message.message),
           true
        )
    );
end

description.@value: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager Authentication Events

source.@value:
rule "SEPM Authentication Events"
when
    to_bool(regex("Site:",to_string($message.message)).matches)
then
    set_fields(
        grok(
            "SymantecServer: (%{GREEDYDATA:symantec_server})?Site: %{GREEDYDATA:symantec_site},Server Name: %{HOSTNAME:src_hostname}(,Domain Name: %{GREEDYDATA:origin_domain},)?(Admin: %{WORD:user_impacted})?,Event Description: %{GREEDYDATA:event_description}",to_string($message.message),true        )
    );
end

rule "Symantec Application Control Logs 2"
when
    to_bool(regex("Device ID:",to_string($message.message)).matches)
then
    set_fields(
        grok(
            "%{HOSTNAME:symantec_server} SymantecServer: %{HOSTNAME:local_hostname},%{IP:local_addr},%{WORD:action},(%{GREEDYDATA:event_description})?( )?- Caller SHA256=%{SHA256hash:SHA256_hash},%{GREEDYDATA:api_name},Begin:%{GREEDYDATA:start_time},End Time:%{GREEDYDATA:end_time},Rule:(%{GREEDYDATA:rule_name})?,%{INT:ProcessID},%{GREEDYDATA:ParentProcess},%{INT:UNWANTED},(%{GREEDYDATA:module_name})?,%{GREEDYDATA:Process},User Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:user_origin})?,Domain Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:domain_origin})?,Action Type: (%{GREEDYDATA:action_type})?,File size \\(bytes\\): (%{INT:file_size})?,Device ID:( %{GREEDYDATA:device_id})?",
           to_string($message.message),
           true
        )
    );
end

rule "Symantec Device Manager Logs"
when
    to_bool(regex("Device Manager",to_string($message.message)).matches)
then
    set_fields(
        grok(
            "SymantecServer: %{HOSTNAME:symantec_server},%{HOSTNAME:local_hostname},(\")?Event Description: %{GREEDYDATA:event_description}. \\[name\\]:%{GREEDYDATA:device_name} \\[class\\]:%{GREEDYDATA:device_class} \\[guid\\]:%{UUID:device_guid}   \\[deviceID\\]:%{GREEDYDATA:device_id},Local Host IP: %{IP:local_addr},Local Host MAC: %{SymantecMAC:src_mac},Remote Host Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:dest_hostname})?,Remote Host IP: (%{IP:dest_ip})?,Remote Host MAC: (%{SymantecMAC:dest_mac})?,(%{GREEDYDATA:UNWANTED})?,(%{GREEDYDATA:UNWANTED})?,,Begin: %{GREEDYDATA:start_time},End Time: %{GREEDYDATA:end_time},Occurrences: %{INT:repeat_count},Application: (%{GREEDYDATA:application})?,Location: %{GREEDYDATA:symantec_org},User Name: %{GREEDYDATA:user_origin},Domain Name: %{GREEDYDATA:domain_origin},Local Port: %{INT:src_port},Remote Port: %{INT:dest_port},CIDS Signature ID: %{GREEDYDATA:sig_id1},CIDS Signature string: (%{GREEDYDATA:sig_name})?,CIDS Signature SubID: %{GREEDYDATA:sig_id2},Intrusion URL: (%{GREEDYDATA:intrusion_url})?,Intrusion Payload URL: (%{GREEDYDATA:payload_url})?,SHA-256: (%{SHA256hash:sha256_hash})?,MD-5:(%{MD5hash:md5_hash})? ,Intensive Protection Level: N/A,URL Risk: N/A,URL Category:",
           to_string($message.message),
           true
        )
    );
end

rule "Symantec Security Logs"
when
    to_bool(regex("CIDS Signature ID",to_string($message.message)).matches)
then
    set_fields(
        grok(
            "SymantecServer: %{HOSTNAME:symantec_server},%{HOSTNAME:local_hostname},Event Description: %{GREEDYDATA:event_description},Local Host IP: %{IP:local_addr},Local Host MAC: %{SymantecMAC:local_mac},Remote Host Name: (%{GREEDYDATA:remote_hostname})?,Remote Host IP: %{IP:remote_addr},Remote Host MAC: %{SymantecMAC:remote_mac},%{WORD:direction},(%{DATA:protocol})?,(Intrusion ID: %{INT:int_id},)?Begin: %{GREEDYDATA:start_time},End Time: %{GREEDYDATA:end_time},Occurrences: %{INT:repeat_count},Application: (%{GREEDYDATA:application})?,Location: %{GREEDYDATA:event_location},User Name: %{GREEDYDATA:user_origin},Domain Name: %{GREEDYDATA:domain_origin},Local Port: %{NUMBER:local_port},Remote Port: %{NUMBER:remote_port},CIDS Signature ID: %{INT:sig_id1},CIDS Signature string: %{GREEDYDATA:sig_name},CIDS Signature SubID: %{INT:sig_id2},Intrusion URL: (%{GREEDYDATA:int_url})?,Intrusion Payload URL: (%{GREEDYDATA:int_payload_url})?,SHA-256: (%{SHA256hash: sha256_hash})?,MD-5:( %{MD5hash:md5_hash})?",
           to_string($message.message),
           true
        )
    );
end
